titles.title: Atchafalaya National Heritage Area Boundary Modification Act
Atchafalaya National Heritage Area Boundary Modification Act
Atchafalaya National Heritage Area Boundary Modification Act
A bill to amend the Atchafalaya National Heritage Area Act to modify the boundary of the Atchafalaya National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Manchin without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 601.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

bill.summary:
Atchafalaya National Heritage Area Boundary Modification Act
This bill expands the boundary of the Atchafalaya National Heritage Area to include Lafourche Parish, Louisiana. The bill also expands the membership of the Atchafalaya Trace Commission, the local coordinating entity for the heritage area, to include a member from the parish.
